entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Parrsboro
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:38 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parrsboro 5:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
Temperature: 6.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 75 %
Dewpoint: 2.8°C
Wind: WSW 12 km/h gust 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Ice pellets or snow. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning then changing to ice pellets or freezing rain late in the morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow or ice pellets. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Ice pellets changing to snow in the evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
